data.Name: Roosevelt
data.Bio: Roosevelt (born Marius Lauber in September 1990) is a German singer, songwriter and producer from Viersen. He is signed to Greco-Roman. His first project was Beat!Beat!Beat!, an indie teenage band where he was the drummer. Years later the band separated and he became a soloist. He then released his acclaimed debut EP 'Elliot' in 2013. The lead single 'Elliot' was named as Pitchfork's 'Best New Track'. Roosevelt then released the double-A side 'Night Moves/Hold On' in 2015 on Greco-Roman which continued a warm synth-pop Read more on Last.fm
